items.title: All Steps | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: List of all steps for Nuix Connector. Sequence connector for Nuix. Easily automate workflows that create cases, ingest data, search, tag and filter, create item sets, export, and create reports.

items.title: NuixAddConcordance Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Adds data from a Concordance file to a NUIX case.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixAddItem Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Adds a file or directory to a Nuix Case.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixAddToItemSet Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Run a search query in Nuix and add all items found to an item set. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixAddToProductionSet Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Run a search query in Nuix and add all items found to a production set. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixAnnotateDocumentIdList Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Annotates a document ID list to add production set names to it.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixAssertPrintPreviewState Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Checks the print preview state of the production set.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixAssignCustodian Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Run a search query on a nuix case and assign found items to a custodian.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixCloseConnection Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Close the connection to nuix. Also closes all cases. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixCountItems Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Returns the number of items matching a particular search term. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixCreateCase Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Creates a new case and opens it.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixCreateIrregularItemsReport Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Creates a list of all irregular items in a case. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixCreateNRTReport Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Create a case report using an NRT file.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixCreateReport Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Creates a report for a Nuix case. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixCreateTermList Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Creates a list of all terms appearing in the case and their frequencies. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixDoesCaseExist Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Returns whether or not a case exists.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixExcludeDecryptedItems Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Excludes password protected items once they have been decrypted. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixExportConcordance Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Exports a production set in Concorfance format. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixExtractEntities Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Extract Entities from a Nuix Case.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixGeneratePrintPreviews Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Generates print previews for items in a production set.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixGetAuditedSize Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Calculate the total audited size for a case. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixGetCaseDetails Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Returns an Entity with information about the current case. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixGetItemProperties Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: A step that the searches a case for items and outputs the values of item properties. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixGetLicenseDetails Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Returns an Entity with information about the Nuix license currently in use. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixGetVersion Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Returns the Nuix version. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixImportDocumentIds Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Imports the given document IDs into this production set. Only works if this production set has imported numbering.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixMigrateCase Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Migrates a case to the latest version if necessary.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixOpenCase Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Migrates a case to the latest version if necessary.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixOpenConnection Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Open the connection to nuix. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixPerformOCR Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Performs optical character recognition on items in a NUIX case.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixRemoveFromItemSet Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Removes particular items from a Nuix item set.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixRemoveFromProductionSet Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Removes particular items from a Nuix production set.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixReorderProductionSet Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Reorders and renumbers the items in a production set.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixRunScript Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Run an arbitrary ruby script in nuix. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixSearchAndExclude Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Run a search query in Nuix and exclude all items found.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: NuixSearchAndTag Step | Nuix Connector Documentation
items.description: Searches a NUIX case with a particular search string and tags all files it finds.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.
